alert.note: Alert for Southern Franklin; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 9:26AM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches for a storm total of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Franklin, Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin, Western Clinton and Western Essex Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel may be very difficult. Isolated to scattered power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northwest winds 25 to 35 mph could produce additional power outages this afternoon into tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
